judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the foregoing extracts from the opinion of Judge Holland.
Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Emanuel Moss, of Moss & Moss, with him Kraus & Weyl and Jerome L. Marleovitz, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Evans’ Estate.
Argued May 12, 1941.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
Emanuel Moss, of Moss & Moss, with him Kraus & Weyl and Jerome L. Marleovitz, for appellant.
Benjamin O. Frióle, for appellee.
June 30, 1941:
